# CheckTypeTag

## InvalidParamType

<!-- Description, Properties, ... sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- REPLACE ME AUTO-GENERATION -->

### Details

Following kind of parameters require the Param/Type tag to be set to 'write' or 'writebit':
- button
- togglebutton
- pagebutton
